textDetector.textRecognizer module¶

class textDetector.textRecognizer.TextRecognizer(mode)¶

Recognizes text from a given image

detectText(image)¶

Detects text from the image given its path Returns a list of bounding boxes

extractCharacters(image)¶

Extracts characters from a given “text” image Input - “image” opencv image

extractText(image, boundingBoxes)¶

Extracts the text from a given image using the bounding boxes Input - image name and the bounding boxes list Output - extracted text images
